summary: Add EnableEagerStart option to PHP SDK's StartWorkflowOptions to support Eager Workflow Dispatch (EWD), which minimizes latency from workflow start to first task processing. This feature is already available in SDK-GO v1.24.0 and needs to be implemented in the PHP SDK.
userImpact: PHP developers using RoadRunner-Temporal plugin can reduce latency-sensitive workflow startup times by enabling eager workflow dispatch.
proposedFix: Add EnableEagerStart boolean option to StartWorkflowOptions structure and implement mechanism to allocate workflow slot on local worker and deliver task from StartWorkflowExecutionResponse.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support EnableEagerStart option in StartWorkflowOptions for eager workflow dispatch capability.
keyQuote: Eager Workflow Dispatch minimizes duration from starting a workflow to processing of first workflow task, making Temporal more suitable for latency sensitive applications.
